Leaders unite over Scotland vote

David Cameron and Ed Miliband urge Scots to reject independence, as Alex Salmond says his government has the right to hold a referendum in 2014.

Husband and wife found murdered

A husband and wife who were found dead at their Birmingham home were discovered by their police officer son, it is revealed.

BBC wins prisoner interview bid

The High Court has ruled that Justice Secretary Ken Clarke was wrong to stop the BBC filming a terrorism suspect held for seven years without trial.

While you will be able to view the content of this page in your current browser, you will not be able to get the full visual experience. Please consider upgrading your browser software or enabling style sheets (CSS) if you are able to do so.
